short_desc: Provides online information on traffic tickets, fines and related legal procedures
description: Website provides information on traffic-related cases, including: three kinds of citations, what happens when stopped by police, what to do upon getting a traffic ticket, what to do if a driver feels they are not guilty, what happens at traffic trials, what happens if a fine is not paid, how much an individual may have to pay, and car insurance in California.Also provides eligibility information for traffic school option. Offers access to California Vehicle Code.
